title: Person: Bald
description:
A person with a bald head. Can be used to represent a bald person or a person with a shaved head. May also be used to represent a person experiencing hair loss from chemotherapy, alopecia, or other medical treatments or conditions. 

This emoji may be used to talk about bald people in a gender-inclusive way.

apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the bald person emoji presents a friendly and approachable visage with smooth, rounded contours. Its skin tone, rendered with subtle gradients and realistic lighting, conveys a sense of warmth and individuality, a hallmark of Apple's design. This emoji on Apple devices is often used to represent oneself, a friend, or a family member with a distinct look, fostering personal connection in digital conversations.
